articles.title: Fastest orbiting asteroid found in our solar system - CNN
articles.description: A newly discovered asteroid, called 2021 PH27, completes one orbit around the sun every 113 days and comes within 12 million miles (20 million kilometers) of our star. It has only the second shortest orbit around the sun after Mercury.
